beastie boys: ahh yeah i looked out the window seen his bald head ran to the fridge and pulled out an egg scoped him with my scopes he had no hair launched that shot and he was caught out there saw the convertible driving by i loaded up the slingshot let one fly he went for his to find he didnt have one put him in check correct with my egg-gun the egg a symbol of life i go inside your house and bust out your wife i pulled out the jammy he thought it was a joke the trigger i pulled -
